text: A cohort shall be associated to one Program of Study offered by the department.
label: concern

text: Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a listing of students to a cohort.
label: concern

text: Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a single student to a cohort
label: concern

text: Students added to a cohort shall be eligible for the cohort鈥檚 Program of Study.
label: concern

text: Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify the preferred sequence of classes for a given cohort.
label: concern

text: For each class within a sequence for a cohort  Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify which quarter that class will be offered.
label: concern

text: For each class within a sequence for a cohort  Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify which quarter that class will be offered.
label: concern

text: Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add new classes to a sequence of classes
label: concern

text: Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add clinical classes or sections to a sequence of classes
label: concern

text: Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a new cohort to the system  identified by start month and year.
label: concern

text: Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add new classes for the nursing department into the system.
label: concern

text: A class shall be either a non-clinical class or a clinical class.
label: concern

text: A non-clinical class shall specify the course name  lecture room requirements  and instructor needs.
label: concern

text: A clinical class shall specify the course name  lecture room requirements  clinical site needs  lecture instructor needs  and clinical lab instructor needs.
label: concern

text: Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall be able to create a new Program of Study.
label: concern

text: A Program of Study shall consist of a program name and listing of required classes (both clinical and non-clinical) that must be completed.
label: concern

text: Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to specify which classes are required for a Program of Study
label: concern

text: The system shall be able to display a report of needed classes for a given quarter for all cohorts of all programs for Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members鈥?planning purposes.
label: concern

text: The report of needed classes shall include (but not be limited to) classes to be offered  number of sections needed  number of labs needed  and room types needed.
label: concern

text: Classes for a given cohort shall not conflict with regards to the time and day that they are offered.
label: concern

text: Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a new clinical site into the system.
label: concern

text: Clinical site information shall include (but not be limited to) the name of the site  contact person  and contact information.
label: concern
concern

text: Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a new clinical lab section for an existing clinical class into the System.
label: concern

text: A clinical lab section shall include the clinical site name  the class  instructor  day and time of the lab.
label: concern

text: Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a student who has registered for a clinical class to a clinical lab section for that class.
label: concern

text: The system shall allow a Program Administrator or Nursing staff member to remove a student from a clinical lab section.
label: concern

text: The system shall allow a Program Administrator/Nursing Staff Member to move a student from one clinical lab section to another clinical lab section corresponding to the same clinical class.
label: concern

text: Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall be able to cancel a clinical lab section only if there are no students registered for that clinical lab section.
label: concern

text: A Program Administrator/Nursing Staff Member shall be able to add a new nursing student to the system.
label: concern

text: A staff member shall have the ability to manage the progress of a part time student  which includes modifying their sequence of classes and timeline of classes.
label: concern

text: The system shall be able to display a printable summary for individual cohorts  which will include the students enlisted  the Program of study  sequence of classes  cohort progress through the program  and timeline of completion.
label: concern

text: The system shall be able to display a printable summary for individual clinical sites  which will include information on labs being held at that site for the given quarter (Clinical site  general information on labs held at that location  dates and times of all labs held there).
label: concern

text: The system shall be able to display a printable summary for individual clinical labs  which will include (but not be limited to) class name  class number  lab section  listing of students enrolled  instructor  day(s)  time  and location.
label: concern

text: The system shall be able to display a printable summary for individual nursing students  which will include (but not be limited to) student name  student ID  admission date  classes  credits  GPA  and the cohort that the student is enrolled in.
label: concern

text: The system shall be able to display a printable summary of the system log.
label: concern

text: The system shall contain contact information (e-mail and phone number) for all people relevant to the system  including (but not limited to) staff members  students  lecture instructors  clinical lab instructors  and clinical site administrators.
label: concern

text: The system will use the stored e-mail addresses as a primary means of communicating information to affected parties.
label: concern

text: The system will notify affected parties for routine communication purposes  including but not limited to informing students of upcoming offered classes (timeline) and what their schedule will be/shall be.
label: concern

text: The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting clinicals  including but not limited to clinical section capacity changes  and clinical section cancellations.
label: concern

text: The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting classes  including but not limited to class cancellations  class section detail changes  and changes to class offerings for a given quarter.
label: concern

text: The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting cohorts  including but not limited to changes to the sequence for a cohort鈥檚 program of study and changes to a given week鈥檚 schedule (lab cancelled this week due to instructor illness).
label: concern

text: The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting specific students  including but not limited to changing a student鈥檚 status from full time to part time and moving a student to a different clinical section.
label: concern

text: Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to cohorts  including cohort identifier  program of study  preferred sequence of classes and quarters that a cohort will be taking specific classes.
label: concern

text: Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to a Program of Study within the Nursing Department  including the Program of study name  and required classes for that Program of Study.
label: concern

text: Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to a Clinical Site  including the clinical site name  site contact person  contact information  and address.
label: concern

text: Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to a Clinical Lab Section  including the clinical site name  the department/section for the lab  the class  instructor  day and time of lab  and contact information.
label: concern

text: Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to a Nursing Student  including student ID  student name  phone number  e-mail  status (full time or part time)  and program of study.
label: concern

text: The Disputes application shall comply with the corporate standards for user interface creation for internally and externally used applications.
label: concern

text: All screens created as part of the Disputes application must comply with corporate standards for interface creation.
label: concern

text: The list of dispute cases that are displayed after a search is performed must be color coded for easy identification of dispute cases based upon the dispute case status.
label: concern

text: 100% of the cardmember and merchant services representatives shall use the Disputes application regularly after a 2-day training course.
label: concern
concern
concern
concern

text: 100% of cardmember services representatives shall be able to successfully create a dispute case on the first encounter after completing the training course.
label: concern
concern
concern

text: 100% of merchant services representatives shall be able to successfully perform a follow up action on a dispute case on the first encounter after completing the training course.
label: concern
concern
concern

text: The maximum wait time for a user navigating from one screen to another within the Disputes application shall be no more than 5 seconds.
label: concern
concern
concern

text: The Disputes application shall support 350 concurrent users without any degradation of performance in the application.
label: concern
concern

text: The Disputes application shall be available 24x7x365  with the exception of the following scheduled maintenance windows.  Monday 鈥?Saturday 3:00am to 4:00am EST Sunday 1:00amd to 5:00am EST

concern
concern

text: The Disputes application shall interface with the Statement Database. The Statement Database provides the transaction details to the Disputes System. All transaction details must be obtained from the Statement Database
label: concern
concern
concern

text: The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Information Database.  The Cardmember Information Database provides detailed information with regard to a cardmember.  All cardmember detail information must be obtained from the Cardmember Information Database.
label: concern
concern
concern

text: The Disputes applications shall interface with the Merchant Information Database.  The Merchant Information Database provides detailed information with regard to the merchant. All merchant detail information shall be obtained from the Merchant Information Database.
label: concern
concern
concern

text: The Disputes application shall interface with the Letters application.  This will allow the Disputes application to request letters as part of the dispute initiation and dispute follow up process. All letter requests must be sent to the Print Letter Utility application.
label: concern
concern
concern

text: The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Posting and Billing System.  This will allow the Disputes application to request adjustments to cardmember and merchant鈥檚 accounts. All adjustment requests must be sent to the Cardmember Posting and Billing System.
label: concern
concern
concern

text: The Disputes application shall ensure that only users with the appropriate access level are allowed to initiate dispute requests.
label: concern

text: Only users with Update access must be able to initiate dispute requests.
label: concern

text: The Disputes application shall ensure that only authorized users are allowed to logon to the application.
label: concern

text: All authorized users  once authenticated must be able to logon to the Disputes System
label: concern

text: The Disputes System shall generate a User Report that details any new users that have been added and any changes to an existing user鈥檚 access level.  The report will be reviewed for auditing purposes.
label: concern
concern

text: All additions of new users and modifications to user鈥檚 access shall be recorded on the User Report.
label: concern

text: If a user account is revoked  it can only be re-instantiated by the System Administrator.
label: concern

text: Only the System Administrator shall be able to reset a revoked user logon account
label: concern

text: The Disputes application shall manipulate and view business data. Users will not have direct access to data files or databases.
label: concern

text: All updates to data files or database must be initiated from the Disputes System.
label: concern

text: The Disputes application must conform to the legal requirements as specified by the Merchant Operating Regulations.
label: concern

text: All business rules specified in the Disputes System shall be in compliance with the Merchant Operating Regulations.
label: concern

text: The Disputes application must conform to the legal requirements as specified by Regulation E and Regulation Z that govern credit card disputes processing.
label: concern

text: All business rules specified in the Disputes System shall be in compliance to the guidelines of Regulation E and Regulation Z.
label: concern

text: The Disputes application must maintain a detailed history of every action that a user takes on a dispute case.  This ensures a complete audit trail if questions arise later on with regard to a particular dispute case.
label: concern

text: All actions that modify an existing dispute case must be recorded in the case history.
label: concern

text: The Disputes System must be accessible by both internal and external users.
label: concern

text: The Disputes System must prevent users from accessing any dispute cases that do not belong to their cardholder base.
label: concern

text: The Disputes System will facilitate direct data entry of a dispute case via a user interface that supports real time responses to the users.
label: concern

text: The Disputes System must provide different levels of access with regard to disputes case initiation and follow-up actions.
label: concern

text: The Disputes System shall provide view access capability for authorized users of the application.
label: concern

text: The Disputes System shall provide update access capability for authorized users of the application.
label: concern

text: The Disputes System must allow the users to select disputable transactions (based on the age of the transaction) from a user interface and initiate a dispute (ticket retrieval request or chargeback notification) on the selected transaction.
label: concern

text: The Disputes System must provide the user the ability to initiate a single dispute case on multiple transactions that belong to a single merchant.
label: concern

text: The Disputes System will provide the user the ability to create or initiate a ticket retrieval request.   As part of ticket retrieval creation process the system must prompt the user to enter all the required information to create the ticket retrieval request.  The ticket retrieval request is a document that is sent to merchant inquiring the validity of a transaction.
label: concern
concern

text: The Disputes System must allow the user to create three unique types of ticket retrieval requests.  The three types of ticket retrieval requests are (1) Request for original receipt (2) Request for a copy of the receipt or (3) Request for a portfolio. A portfolio consists of documentation that would provide proof of a purchase such as the documentation that is received from a car rental agency that is more than a sales receipt.
label: concern
concern

text: The Disputes System must prevent external users from requesting original receipts. Requests for original receipts are restricted to internal users.
label: concern

text: The Disputes System must provide a confirmation to the user upon the creation of ticket retrieval request that contains the following information; the dispute case number  the type of retrieval requested (copy  original or portfolio)  and the date that the merchant response is due.
label: concern

text: The Disputes System shall allow the user to create or initiate a chargeback request.  The system must prompt the user to enter the required information to initiate a chargeback request. The chargeback request results in a printed chargeback notification that is sent to merchant indicating that their account will be charged back if no proof is provided that the disputed transaction is valid.
label: concern
concern

text: The Disputes System must provide a confirmation to the user upon the creation of a chargeback request. The confirmation must contain the following information; the dispute case number  the type of chargeback requested (pending or immediate)  and the date that the merchant response is due.
label: concern
concern

text: The Disputes System shall prevent the creation of duplicate dispute requests 100% of the time.
label: concern
concern

text: The Disputes System shall accurately provide a list of possible reason codes for a given transaction.  The list of possible reason codes must be derived based on the type of transaction and the industry that the merchant belongs to  according to the business rules defined for the Disputes System.
label: concern
concern
concern

text: The Disputes System must provide the ability to view existing dispute cases.
label: concern

text: The Disputes System must provide Search functionality.  The search method must include the ability to search by (1) the dispute case number  (2) the merchant account number  (3) the cardmember account number and (4) the issuer number.  In addition to the above criteria  the search functionality must further allow the user to limit the results of the search by a date range  the type of dispute (ticket retrieval request or chargeback notification)  the case status (open  closed or all) and the dispute reason code.
label: concern
concern
concern

text: A list of all disputes cases that meet the entered search criteria must be provided to the user.  The list of cases must differentiate the type and/or status of the case by color -coding the line item in the list.  For example all open cases will be yellow and all closed cases will be gray.
label: concern
concern

text: The Disputes System shall provide the users the ability to view the history of all activities that have occurred on the dispute case.
label: concern

text: The Dispute System shall provide the users with the ability to follow up on a dispute case via follow-up actions.  The list of available follow up actions for a given dispute case must be filtered by the status of the case and the access level of the user.
label: concern
concern

text: The Disputes System shall record the name of the user and the date for any activity that creates or modifies the disputes case in the system.  A detailed history of the actions taken on the case  including the date and the user that performed the action must be maintained for auditing purposes.
label: concern

text: For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process  a case activity will be generated.  Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.
label: concern

text: All letter requests must be formatted according to guidelines specified by the Print Letter Utility system.
label: concern

text: Any disputes cases that have been closed for over 6 months must be purged from the online disputes database.
label: concern

label: Concerns

text: The product shall be supported using the corporate support center.
label: Concerns

text: Product installations and upgrades shall be handled by the middleware technology team within established launch time frames.
label: Concerns
Concerns

text: Only adjusters can request recycled parts audit reports. No users without an adjuster role shall request recycled parts audits.
label: Concerns
Concerns
Concerns
Concerns

text: Only adjusters with a supervisor role can update preferred repair facility ratings. Users without the supervisor role cannot access the repair facility ratings.
label: Concerns
Concerns
Concerns
Concerns

text: Only collision estimators shall search for recycled parts.  Users without the collision estimator role shall not have access to the search for recycled parts.
label: Concerns
Concerns
Concerns
Concerns

text: Only valid data shall be entered into the system.  No invalid data shall be entered into the system.
label: Concerns
Concerns
Concerns
Concerns

text: One insurance company shall not be able to view another insurance companys claim data.
label: Concerns

text: The product shall free of computer viruses.
label: Concerns

text: The system shall prevent malicious attacks including denial of service.
label: Concerns

text: The product must comply with Sarbanes-Oxley.
label: Concerns

text: The product shall comply with the estimatics laws relating to recycled parts usage.
label: Concerns

text: The product shall comply with insurance regulations regarding claims processing.
label: Concerns

text: The user shall search for the preferred repair facility using vehicle  vehicle location  and radius in miles
label: Concerns

text: The vehicle data shall include vehicle year  make  and model
label: Concerns

text: The vehicle location shall include street address  city  state  and zipcode
label: Concerns

text: The system shall resolve the zipcode for the street address  city  and state if zipcode is unknown.
label: Concerns
Concerns

text: The search radius shall be between 1 and 30 miles
label: Concerns

text: The system shall locate the preferred repair facility with the highest ratings for the input criteria
label: Concerns
Concerns
Concerns

text: The adjuster shall enter the preferred repair facility on the estimate assignment.
label: Concerns
Concerns

text: The adjuster shall be able to override the preferred repair facitlity on the estimate assignment.
label: Concerns
Concerns

text: The preferred repair facility shall be returned to the user.
label: Concerns

text: The system shall return a list of repair facilities within the radius if the preferred repair facility cannot be determined.
label: Concerns
Concerns
Concerns

text: The estimator shall search for available recycled parts using damaged vehicle parts information.
label: Concerns
Concerns

text: The estimator shall search for available recycled parts using a list of preferred parts suppliers.
label: Concerns
Concerns

text: The system shall search for available recycled parts for the supplied vehicle parts and suppliers.
label: Concerns
Concerns

text: The estimator shall search by zipcode with a radius of 30 miles if no parts are found for the preferred parts suppliers
label: Concerns
Concerns
Concerns

text: The system shall retain the available recycled parts and suppliers returned from the search.
label: Concerns
Concerns

text: The available recycled parts information and their suppliers shall be returned to the user.
label: Concerns

text: The estimator shall apply selected recycled parts to the collision estimate.
label: Concerns

text: The estimator shall not apply recycled parts to the collision estimate if no available parts are returned.
label: Concerns
Concerns

text: The adjuster shall review the collision estimate.
label: Concerns

text: The adjuster shall request a recycled parts audit of the collision estimate.
label: Concerns

text: The recycled parts search results provided to the estimator shall be retrieved by the system.
label: Concerns

text: The system shall generate an audit report based on the available recycled parts and the collision estimate.
label: Concerns
Concerns

text: The audit report shall include the total number of recycled parts used in the estimate.
label: Concerns
Concerns

text: The audit report shall include the number of available recycled parts from the original search results.
label: Concerns
Concerns

text: The audit report shall include the percentage of available recycled parts used in the estimate
label: Concerns
Concerns

text: The audit report shall include the total score of the audit which sums the indivual line items.
label: Concerns
Concerns

text: The audit report shall be displayed to the user.
label: Concerns

text: The audit report shall be available to other adjusters at later points in time.
label: Concerns
Concerns

text: The user shall select to view the preferred repair facility ratings.
label: Concerns

text: The current repair facility ratings shall be displayed to the user.
label: Concerns

text: The system will display a blank set of ratings if there are not ratings yet defined.
label: Concerns
Concerns

text: The user shall enter new ratings based on the audit report
label: Concerns
Concerns

text: The ratings shall be from a scale of 1-10
label: Concerns

text: The ratings shall include categories for attempted use of recycled parts and actual use of recycled parts
label: Concerns
Concerns

text: The user shall select to save the preferred repair facility ratings.
label: Concerns

text: The preferred repair facility ratings shall be saved by the system.
label: Concerns

text: The product must work with most database management systems (DBMS) on the market  whether the DBMS is colocated with the product on the same machine or is located on a different machine on the computer network.
label: Concerns
Concerns

text: The product will function alongside server software on any operating system where the Java runtime can be installed.

Concerns
Concerns

text: The product will require collaboration with a database management system (DBMS).  The DBMS may be located on the same machine as the product or on a separate machine residing on the same computer network.
label: Concerns
Concerns

text: The product must make use of web/application server technology.  Open source examples include Apache web server  Tomcat  and the JBoss application server.
label: Concerns

text: A database management system such as Oracle  DB2  MySql or HSQL will need to be integrated with the product.
label: Concerns

text: The product shall have a conservative and professional appearance.
